document_data.name: Khareesa H'kar
document_data.deathnotes: (Stabbed through the back by [[Bregan D'aerthe]] soldiers on the Isle of Rothe)
document_data.mainbody: '''Khareesa H'kar''' was a [[drow]] [[elf]] slaver of [[House H'kar]] in [[Menzoberranzan]].
document_data.Description: The drow female was very beautiful with fine facial features, shapely legs, and thick white hair.
document_data.Personality: Like most drow, Khareesa was wicked and enjoyed making other creatures, such as [[goblin]]s suffer her wrath.
document_data.Possessions: In battle, Khareesa, clad in suit of [[drow chainmail]], used a fine [[sword]] and [[whip]].
document_data.History:
In [[1357 DR]], [[Drizzt Do'Urden]] journeyed into the [[Underdark]] and returned to 
Menzoberranzan. The drow [[ranger]] joined a band of slavers, led by Khareesa, and entered the city.

Shortly after returning to Menzoberranzan, [[Bregan D'aerthe]] soldiers spied Drizzt and traveled to the [[Isle of Rothé]] to interrogate Khareesa about the drow renegade. After revealing Drizzt's name, the soldiers backstabbed Khareesa through the kidney, cut her head off, and tossed it at Drizzt when he arrived back on the island.
